verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> were allotted הַגּוֹרָל֙ <WH1486> There was also a lot לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> for the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh כִּי־ <WH3588> because ה֖וּא <WH1931> he בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> for he [was] the firstborn יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> of Joseph לְמָכִיר֩ <WH4353> [to wit] for Machir בְּכ֨וֹר <WH1060> the firstborn מְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <WH4519> of Manasseh אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father הַגִּלְעָ֗ד <WH1568> of Gilead כִּ֣י <WH3588> because ה֤וּא <WH1931> he הָיָה֙ <WH1961> were allotted אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> because he was a man מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> of war וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> were allotted ל֖וֹ הַגִּלְעָ֥ד <WH1568> therefore he had Gilead וְהַבָּשָֽׁן׃ <WH1316> and Bashan

וַ֠יְהִי <WH1961> become לִבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <WH4519> of Manasseh הַנּוֹתָרִים֮ <WH3498> There was also [a lot] for the rest לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <WH4940> by their families לִבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> for the children אֲבִיעֶ֜זֶר <WH44> of Abiezer וְלִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and for the children חֵ֗לֶק <WH2507> of Helek וְלִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> and for the children אַשְׂרִיאֵל֙ <WH844> of Asriel וְלִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and for the children שֶׁ֔כֶם <WH7928> of Shechem וְלִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and for the children חֵ֖פֶר <WH2660> of Hepher וְלִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and for the children שְׁמִידָ֑ע <WH8061> of Shemida אֵ֠לֶּה <WH428> these בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> children מְנַשֶּׁ֧ה <WH4519> of Manasseh בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> of Joseph הַזְּכָרִ֖ים <WH2145> these [were] the male לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> by their families

וְלִצְלָפְחָד֩ <WH6765> But Zelophehad בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֵ֨פֶר <WH2660> of Hepher בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גִּלְעָ֜ד <WH1568> of Gilead בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מָכִ֣יר <WH4353> of Machir בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> of Manasseh לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֥יוּ <WH1961> had ל֛וֹ בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> had no sons כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo בָּנ֑וֹת <WH1323> but daughters וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> and these שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> and these [are] the names בְּנֹתָ֔יו <WH1323> of his daughters מַחְלָ֣ה <WH4244> Mahlah וְנֹעָ֔ה <WH5270> and Noah חָגְלָ֥ה <WH2295> Hoglah מִלְכָּ֖ה <WH4435> Milcah וְתִרְצָֽה׃ <WH8656> and Tirzah

וַתִּקְרַ֡בְנָה <WH7126> And they came near לִפְנֵי֩ <WH6440> before אֶלְעָזָ֨ר <WH499> Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> the priest וְלִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <WH6440> and before יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֗וּן <WH5126> of Nun וְלִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> and before הַנְּשִׂיאִים֙ <WH5387> the princes לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> commanded אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> Moses לָֽתֶת־ <WH5414> to give לָ֥נוּ נַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> us an inheritance בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> among אַחֵ֑ינוּ <WH251> our brethren וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> he gave לָהֶ֜ם אֶל־ <WH413> according פִּ֤י <WH6310> Therefore according to the commandment יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God נַֽחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> them an inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> among אֲחֵ֥י <WH251> the brethren אֲבִיהֶֽן׃ <WH1> of their father

וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> And there fell חַבְלֵֽי־ <WH2256> portions מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> to Manasseh עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <WH6235> ten לְבַ֞ד <WH905> alone מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> beside the land הַגִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> of Gilead וְהַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> and Bashan אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which מֵעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> which [were] on the other side לַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> Jordan

כִּ֚י <WH3588> because בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> Because the daughters מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh נָחֲל֥וּ <WH5157> had נַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> an inheritance בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> among בָּנָ֑יו <WH1121> his sons וְאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> had the land הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> of Gilead הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> belonged לִבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> of Manasseh's הַנּֽוֹתָרִֽים׃ <WH3498> and the rest

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> ran גְבוּל־ <WH1366> And the coast מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> of Manasseh מֵֽאָשֵׁ֔ר <WH836> was from Asher הַֽמִּכְמְתָ֔ת <WH4366> to Michmethah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> that [lieth] before שְׁכֶ֑ם <WH7927> Shechem וְהָלַ֤ךְ <WH1980> went along הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> and the border אֶל־ <WH413> about הַיָּמִ֔ין <WH3225> on the right hand אֶל־ <WH413> to יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> unto the inhabitants עֵ֥ין תַּפּֽוּחַ׃ <WH5887> of Entappuah

לִמְנַשֶּׁ֕ה <WH4519> [Now] Manasseh הָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> belonged אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> had the land תַּפּ֑וּחַ <WH8599> of Tappuah וְתַפּ֛וּחַ <WH8599> but Tappuah אֶל־ <WH413> on גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> on the border מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> of Manasseh לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> [belonged] to the children אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> of Ephraim

וְיָרַ֣ד <WH3381> descended הַגְּבוּל֩ <WH1366> And the coast נַ֨חַל <WH5158> unto the river קָנָ֜ה <WH7071> Kanah נֶ֣גְבָּה <WH5045> southward לַנַּ֗חַל <WH5158> of the river עָרִ֤ים <WH5892> these cities הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> [are] among עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> the cities מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> of Manasseh וּגְב֤וּל <WH1366> the coast מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> of Manasseh מִצְּפ֣וֹן <WH6828> also [was] on the north side לַנַּ֔חַל <WH5158> of the river וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> and the outgoings הַיָּֽמָּה׃ <WH3220> of it were at the sea

נֶ֣גְבָּה <WH5045> Southward לְאֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> [it was] Ephraim's וְצָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <WH6828> and northward לִמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> [it was] Manasseh's וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> and the sea גְּבוּל֑וֹ <WH1366> is his border וּבְאָשֵׁר֙ <WH836> in Asher יִפְגְּע֣וּן <WH6293> and they met together מִצָּפ֔וֹן <WH6828> on the north וּבְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> and in Issachar מִמִּזְרָֽח׃ <WH4217> on the east

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> had לִמְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <WH4519> And Manasseh בְּיִשָּׂשכָ֣ר <WH3485> had in Issachar וּבְאָשֵׁ֗ר <WH836> and in Asher בֵּית־ שְׁאָ֣ן <WH1052> Bethshean וּ֠בְנוֹתֶיהָ <WH1323> and her towns וְיִבְלְעָ֨ם <WH2991> and Ibleam וּבְנוֹתֶ֜יהָ <WH1323> and her towns וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֧י <WH3427> and the inhabitants דֹ֣אר <WH1756> of Dor וּבְנוֹתֶ֗יהָ <WH1323> and her towns וְיֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> and the inhabitants עֵֽין־ דֹּר֙ <WH5874> of Endor וּבְנֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> and her towns וְיֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> and the inhabitants תַעְנַךְ֙ <WH8590> of Taanach וּבְנֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> and her towns וְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> and the inhabitants מְגִדּ֖וֹ <WH4023> of Megiddo וּבְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH1323> and her towns שְׁלֹ֖שֶׁת <WH7969> [even] three הַנָּֽפֶת׃ <WH5316> countries

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָכְלוּ֙ <WH3201> could בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Yet the children מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh לְהוֹרִ֖ישׁ <WH3423> not drive out אֶת־ <WH853> הֶֽעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> [the inhabitants of] those cities הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> of these וַיּ֙וֹאֶל֙ <WH2974> would הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> but the Canaanites לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> dwell בָּאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> in that land הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> It

וַֽיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came כִּ֤י <WH3588> when חָֽזְקוּ֙ <WH2388> were waxen strong בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Yet it came to pass when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> that they put אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> the Canaanites לָמַ֑ס <WH4522> to tribute וְהוֹרֵ֖שׁ <WH3423> but did not utterly לֹ֥א <WH3808> out הוֹרִישֽׁוֹ׃ <WH3423> drive them out ס

וַֽיְדַבְּרוּ֙ <WH1696> spake בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> of Joseph אֶת־ <WH854> for יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying מַדּוּעַ֩ <WH4069> Why נָתַ֨תָּה <WH5414> Why hast thou given לִּ֜י נַחֲלָ֗ה <WH5159> to inherit גּוֹרָ֤ל <WH1486> lot אֶחָד֙ <WH259> me [but] one וְחֶ֣בֶל <WH2256> portion אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> and one וַֽאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I עַם־ <WH5971> people רָ֔ב <WH7227> seeing I [am] a great עַ֥ד <WH5704> forasmuch as אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom עַד־ <WH5704> far כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> has thus בֵּֽרְכַ֥נִי <WH1288> hath blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> answered אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> about יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אִם־ <WH518> If עַם־ <WH5971> people רַ֤ב <WH7227> them If thou [be] a great אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5927> [then] get thee up לְךָ֣ הַיַּ֔עְרָה <WH3293> to the wood וּבֵרֵאתָ֤ <WH1254> [country] and cut down לְךָ֙ שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> for thyself there in the land הַפְּרִזִּ֖י <WH6522> of the Perizzites וְהָֽרְפָאִ֑ים <WH7497> and of the giants כִּֽי־ <WH3588> since אָ֥ץ <WH213> be too narrow לְךָ֖ הַר־ <WH2022> if mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> Ephraim

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> said בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> of Joseph לֹֽא־ <WH3808> is not יִמָּ֥צֵא <WH4672> is not enough לָ֖נוּ הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> The hill וְרֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> have chariots בַּרְזֶ֗ל <WH1270> of iron בְּכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> for us and all the Canaanites הַיֹּשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> that dwell בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> in the land הָעֵ֔מֶק <WH6010> of the valley לַֽאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who בְּבֵית־ שְׁאָן֙ <WH1052> [both they] who [are] of Bethshean וּבְנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> and her towns וְלַֽאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> and [they] who [are] of the valley יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <WH3157> of Jezreel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> of Joseph לְאֶפְרַ֥יִם <WH669> [even] to Ephraim וְלִמְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> and to Manasseh לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying עַם־ <WH5971> people רַ֣ב <WH7227> Thou [art] a great אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you וְכֹ֤חַ <WH3581> power גָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> and hast great לָ֔ךְ לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> have לְךָ֖ גּוֹרָ֥ל <WH1486> lot אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> thou shalt not have one

כִּ֣י <WH3588> even הַ֤ר <WH2022> But the mountain יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לָּךְ֙ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> though יַ֣עַר <WH3293> shall be thine for it [is] a wood ה֔וּא <WH1931> you וּבֵ֣רֵאת֔וֹ <WH1254> and thou shalt cut it down וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become לְךָ֖ תֹּֽצְאֹתָ֑יו <WH8444> and the outgoings כִּֽי־ <WH3588> though תוֹרִ֣ישׁ <WH3423> of it shall be thine for thou shalt drive out אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <WH3669> the Canaanites כִּ֣י <WH3588> though רֶ֤כֶב <WH7393> chariots בַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> though they have iron ל֔וֹ כִּ֥י <WH3588> though חָזָ֖ק <WH2389> [and] though they [be] strong הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he פ
